analysis.description:
SNDTokenSale.fallback (/unique_chucks/6/0x1067ade842eed2bf1bba5c4c5a4177d51ac8e8e1.sol#453-474) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,tokensToSend) (/unique_chucks/6/0x1067ade842eed2bf1bba5c4c5a4177d51ac8e8e1.sol#471)

SNDTokenSale.WithdrawTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0x1067ade842eed2bf1bba5c4c5a4177d51ac8e8e1.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-tokenReward.transfer(beneficiary,amount) (/unique_chucks/6/0x1067ade842eed2bf1bba5c4c5a4177d51ac8e8e1.sol)
SafeMath.assert (function @ /unique_chucks/6/0x1067ade842eed2bf1bba5c4c5a4177d51ac8e8e1.sol#66-75) shadows built-in symbol "assert"
